ChildProfile.title: Child Profile
ChildProfile.description: Stores information about a child using the app.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the profile was created.

favouriteGenres.description: List of genres the child enjoys (e.g., 'funny', 'magical').

favouriteCharacterTypes.description: Common character types the child likes (e.g., 'self', 'pet').

preferredStoryLength.description: The typical story length the child prefers.

helpPreference.description: How much guidance the child prefers.

StorySession.title: Story Session
StorySession.description: Represents a single story creation session for a child.

id.description: Unique identifier for the story session.

childId.description: Reference to the child who owns this session.

status.description: The current status of the story.

currentPhase.description: The current phase of the story creation flow (e.g., 'warmup', 'planBeats').

currentStepIndex.description: The index of the current step within the current phase.

storyVibe.description: The chosen vibe or genre for the story.

characters.description: An array of characters in the story.

beats.description: The planned story beats or plot points.

finalStoryText.description: The full, final generated story text.

Character.title: Story Character
Character.description: A character within a story session.

StoryBeat.title: Story Beat
StoryBeat.description: A single plot point or section of the story.

label.description: A machine-readable label for the beat (e.g., 'start', 'problem').

childPlanText.description: The child's one or two sentence plan for this beat.

draftText.description: The AI-drafted paragraph for this beat.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: A single message in a story session conversation.

Choice.title: Chat Choice
Choice.description: A tappable choice presented to the child in the chat.

label.description: The text displayed to the child.

value.description: The machine-readable value sent back when tapped.

PromptConfig.title: Prompt Configuration
PromptConfig.description: Configuration for Genkit prompts, driving the conversation for a specific phase and language level.

id.description: Unique identifier for the prompt configuration.

phase.description: The story creation phase this config applies to (e.g., 'warmup', 'planBeats').

languageLevel.description: Optional language complexity level this config targets.

systemPrompt.description: High-level behavior instructions for the Genkit LLM.

modeInstructions.description: Detailed instructions for the current phase.

additionalContextTemplate.description: A template for injecting dynamic data into the prompt. Can contain placeholders like {{childName}}.

allowedChatMoves.description: Defines the types of responses the AI is allowed to make (e.g. 'ask_short_question').

/storySessions/{storySessionId}/messages.description: Stores the sequence of messages for a given story session.

/promptConfigs/{configId}.description: Stores the prompt configurations that drive the AI's behavior.
